modName: Dark Brotherhood - No Auto Quest Start
summary: Delays the start of the Dark Brotherhood quest until the player has spoken to Aventus.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=yellow]THIS MOD HAS BEEN UPDATED AND EXPANDED.
The newest version of this mod can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26359]HERE[/url].
[/color][/b][/size][/center]

If you hear rumors about the Dark Brotherhood or a boy in Windhelm, these rumors will no longer trigger the start of the Dark Brotherhood quest.

In order to start the Dark Brotherhood quest, you must actually speak to Aventus. You will not get any quest markers or journal updates until after you've spoken to Aventus.


[b][size=4]Also Check Out:[/size][/b]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14157]Thieves Guild Requirements -- No Auto Quest Start[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23431]Sell Unusual Gems -- Stones of Barenziah[/url][/size]
